CustomField.description: This will refresh forecast data GLOBALLY across Salesforce for any Jobs modified sync the last successful refresh. You can review the status of a global refresh by checking Setup > Monitoring > Apex Jobs
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This will refresh forecast data GLOBALLY across Salesforce for any Jobs modified sync the last successful refresh. You can review the status of a global refresh by checking Setup > Monitoring > Apex Jobs
CustomField.label: Update Forecasts (Global/Fast)
